title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. VI, pt. 310 - Special Housing Unit Case Management Committee
content:

§ 310.1 - Establishment of the special housing unit case management committee
§ 310.2 - Role of the special housing unit case management committee
§ 310.3 - Procedure of the special housing unit case management committee

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. VI, pt. 310

Statutory authority: Correction Law, §§112, 138, 401

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
